abstract: Joss Whedon, the "Avengers" director and producer of fantasy television shows like "Buffy," "Firefly" and "Dollhouse," has once again thrown audiences for a loop by announcing that he has finished shooting a low-budget adaptation of Shakespeare's "Much Ado About Nothing" that was filmed in 12 days.

headline.main: A To-Do About a Surprise 'Much Ado' From Joss Whedon
